update.name: CVE-2024-4577-PHP-RCE
update.description: [漏洞复现] 全球首款利用PHP默认环境的CVE-2024-4577 PHP-CGI RCE 漏洞 EXP，共享原创EXP，支持SSRF，支持绕过WAF。The world's first CVE-2024-4577 PHP-CGI RCE exploit utilizing the default PHP environment. Sharing original exploit, supports SSRF, supports WAF bypass.
